Project.Name: 1EX v5
Project.Description: Route for Breath of the Wild 100% Extended

Clip out of SOR, NO TOD.notes: Activating TOD after plat so TOD works nicely with darners in Rito

BLSS to tower.notes: Can also do Mag first, then tower. Both have pros and cons so do whichever you prefer

_Shrine::OmanAu.notes: Don't get ragdoll inside shrine if you already did tower. If you did mag first, bomb your self in the end

+BLSS to activate TOD.notes: Activating TOD now for TOD routing in Rito 1

+BLSS to ToT.notes: Use tree for better initial angle, or use the stone

+.dir(<<N) TS.notes: For food in this section, eat peppers until 2 (need 2 for cold potion)

WB to flagpole.notes: Find a visual cue to aim at since the map is dungeon mode when inside castle

Start Rupey Dupey.notes: Want Shafts or Cores. Make sure part combo is not laggy. If no springs, kill 2/3 stalkers on the way for springs. Same with shafts

_Shop<Buy Everything>.notes: Gear + Shaft: Sell all gears. Shaft: Sell 30+ shafts. Core: Sell 15+ cores.

_Equipment::Bow<Falcon Bow>.notes: Use FDB to shoot the targets

_Chest<Ancient Core>.notes: We are going to dupe cores in rito stable. If you already have cores, then dupe springs or shafts depending on which you need more of

.enemy(Windblight 1).notes: Equip ATK 3, FDB shoot 3 times each phase. Might want to glide closer if he is far to hit all headshots

Dupe.notes: Unequip all armor. Cores: Drop 8 shafts + 1 core, start from FDB. Shafts/Springs: Drop 6 cores. Hold smuggle shafts or cores and sell all of them. Then pick up, unhold, dupe bow, and finally buy from beedle

_Material<Octoballoon + Voltfin>.notes: Kill octoroks, if not dropped, reload. SAVE + reload after got both

BLSS to Kak.notes: Want to go to the side and curve in. Should have plenty of time to get paya skip

Dupe.notes: Royal -> GEB. Hold smuggle 5 peppers. Inside shop is more consistent. If need springs, also buy boko guts and goat butter

_Material<Beetle,6>.notes: Unhold after getting beetle. Remember to dupe bow

_Shrine::TalohNaeg.notes: Equip 2 phantom pieces so you can blow yourself up in the end.

_Cook<Potions>.notes: 2 princess + 3 night shade for stealth, darner + useless guardian part for chill, 3 frogs + carrot/frog + core for speed

_Shrine::MyahmAgana.notes: Save inside shrine so the autosave stays inside

Farosh Farming.notes: 1 Scale, 1 Horn, 1 Claw. Don't use torch, just shoot fire arrow

_Material<Beetle, 5>.notes: also grab the 2 green beetle for duping

_Shop<Arrows + Carrots + 1 Egg>.notes: Also buy boko guts if need springs

.enemy(Kill 3 Bokos).notes: 2 Bomb arrows with falcon bow shoot in middle

_Discover<Goponga Village Ruins>.notes: Need a low wb to discover this while flying

_Material<Tail, 4>.notes: Equip phantom 3 and 1 ice arrow headshot each with GEB. Keep melting shrine at mean time. Also kill the archer

Activate Kuh Takkar.notes: Doing the shrine later in case of SCW failure

_Snap::Elite<Kohga>.notes: Use dragonbone club to fight kohga. Break it/throw away in the end

Drop All Springs.notes: Smuggle boko guts and goat button

Gerudo 1: Ride sand seal to misae suma

Backflip WB to naboris.notes: Aim left of quest dot, east

.enemy(Thunderblight 1).notes: Break shield, run a bit away, statis+ 8 headshots

Shoot Eye.notes: Activate race first, so you can midair away after shooting eye

_Snap::Quest<Red Lynel>.notes: Walk down one level and zoom

_Snap::Elite<Naydra>.notes: Snap while waiting for scale to fall

Naydra Farming.notes: Get a horn and a claw. WB to N18 after first shot, then make morning there. Ideally parts should fall to the spring

Activate Shae Mosah.notes: Doing this later for heart refill

_Npc::Goron<Yunobo>.notes: Either get unloaded rock or clip in

_Tod::Morning.notes: Set campfire near luminous ores. This makes dinraal spawn low. Farm luminous ores as talus dies and pick up his parts

.enemy(Lynel).notes: Let first GEB break here or before rudania. If no hoof, kill the next lynel too. Grab horns for duping.

Shoot Dinraal.notes: Should be passing soon after lynel dies. Make morning after part drops. Shoot dinraal twice more for horn and claw

Do Escort.notes: Farm Amber/flint on the way. Use metal box to kill drones

.gale() inside rudania.notes: Break GEB and pick up Knight's Bow for trick shot

.enemy(Fireblight 1).notes: Stasis+ 8 headshots, ATK 2. Stasis, bullet time, change armor

Eldin 1: BLSS to Akkala Tower from ores

.enemy(Waterblight 1).notes: ATK 3, STASIS 9-10 shots. No snap (we snap during refight)

_Chest<Lightscale Trident>.notes: Need 4 weapons here since we need to pick up 4 weapons on plat 2: OHO, blizzard rod, boko spear for blue flame, and electrict rod. Will dupe 4 crushers (3 + 1 backup)

_Shrine::DagahKeek.notes: Don't use trident afterwards. Needed for duping

Zora Domain 1: Run to other side of mountain

_Warp::SOR.notes: OHO Overloading: Unequip armor and shield. Equip Trident. Drop the 5 GEBs with shock arrow out and hold duplex in the end. put duplex away and open menu to see that link only has weapon visible. Now adjust overload so his weapon is also missing. Try switching weapon then unpause and pause, or unequip weapon and equip lynel crusher. Can also try to hold out duplex bow. When weapon is missing, confirm cannot switch weapon, unequip weapon, and pick up OHO. If OHO is invisible during cutscene then it's successful. If not, there is still a chance it might work. For duping, try to switch to trident. If cannot switch, try to unequip bow. If still cannot switch, pick up a bow.

+.gale() SCW.notes: If SCW fail, do shrine first

_Tod::Noon.notes: Need 12-12:30 here. If pass 12 you can do the ball BLSS in the end. If you make 12 here, don't do the ball BLSS since you will end up a bit early for sasa kai.

+SQ enter hideout.notes: stasis guy on left and run to orb. Grab all bananas. Whistle to distract and carry the orb out quickly

_Korok::W25.notes: Shoot from statue for easy wb after

_Boss::Molduga.notes: If you are too slow, fury might be back. Save furies for molduking and thunderblight, don't use here.

.boss(Molduking).notes: Snap after first fury. Run to finish race as it dies.

_Equipment::Shield<Radiant Shield>.notes: Use lightning rod to open the gate

.!!(Drop Electric Rod).notes: If you don't drop it here, you will be very sad when trying to pick up the drillshaft

.enemy(Thunderblight 2).notes: Phase 1: Break shield, stasis, 6 spins SLAM. spin to death. Phase 2: magnesis + break shield + spin

_Material<Electric Darner>.notes: Freeze the lizalfos so he doesn't mess with you

Activate Shrine.notes: Do the midair or use block.

_Boss::Hinox::Black.notes: Fury might be back if you are slow. In this case you could also use 3 furies

+.!!(LOOK SKY EAST).notes: Watch chest land during wb or chest might despawn

_Korok::A14.notes: land and climb down to get it to not lose smuggle

_Tod::Night.notes: Make the campfire but pass time after oaki

Trial of the Sword.notes: Note the TOD to make sure you skip bloodmoon inside the trial

_Boss::Talus::Rare.notes: Get any gems (except ruby) to 3+, for duping

_Shrine::SaasKosah.notes: Keep note of TOD to make sure you are not exiting shrine at 12AM, or BM might be messed up

.enemy(.fury() 3 lizalfos).notes: .v(Tail)/45. Fury on stairs first, then go down and fury 2 more to also fury the black on up there. Kill the 2 silvers.

_Chest<3 AA>.notes: Only if you used too many AAs already

_Chest::Special<EX Royal Guard Uniform>.notes: Equip Royal Guard Set for the flower chase coming up

_Korok::R27.notes: Shoot as falling down to finish the race
